item.title: Comment on Dialogue between an economist and a physicist by Hadur
item.description:
Reply to Dismalist:

Student: Professor, when did you say the universe will end?

Professor: 200 billion years.

Student: Oh, thank God! I thought you had said 200 million years.

Student: Professor, when did you say the universe will end?

Professor: 200 billion years.

Tyler: If you really believe that, why are you not short the market?

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/dialogue-between-an-economist-and-a-physicist.html?commentID=160828445

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/dialogue-between-an-economist-and-a-physicist.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=dialogue-between-an-economist-and-a-physicist

item.title: Comment on The robustness of coal? by Crusader
item.description:
A poignant memory from school was a classmate saying that we needed to immediately stop using fossil fuels, me asking clarification if he meant immediately as in today to which he said yes, me asking how we would get to school tomorrow or not freeze during the night, and him yelling at me that I had been brainwashed by the fossil fuel industry.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-robustness-of-coal.html?commentID=160828176

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-robustness-of-coal.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-robustness-of-coal

Votes: 63⬆ 9⬇
item.dc:creator: Crusader

item.title: Comment on The robustness of coal? by Praising With Faint Damns
item.description:
Reply to Crusader:

A poignant memory from school was a classmate saying that we needed to immediately stop using fossil fuels, me asking clarification if he meant immediately as in today to which he said yes, me asking how we would get to school tomorrow or not freeze during the night, and him yelling at me that I had been brainwashed by the fossil fuel industry.

He yelled at you? My my...that is so uncharacteristic of people that demand the immediate cessation of fossil fuel use.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-robustness-of-coal.html?commentID=160828182

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/the-robustness-of-coal.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-robustness-of-coal
